channel.title: Mysql
channel.description:
If someone can help me set up this stupid Mysql, i'll love you forever, and rep++ you. :D
Warning: mysql_connect() [function.mysql-connect]: Can't connect to MySQL server on '24.121.118.133' (10061) in C:\xampp\htdocs\setup\setup1.php on line 99 Unable to select database
That's the error I get.
[Yes. i don't give a crap if you know the IP. >.> Because it's not like it's the end of the world since it's what I host my server on. XD]
